Flow Time Tracker
The flow time tracker can be used to track the duration of tasks. Please click the Start Flow button to start the timer. If you decide to take a break, please click the Start Break button. If you experience any interruptions that take you away from completing the task, please select the Start Interruption button. Click End Flow when the task is completed and a full breakdown of task duration will be displayed, including the break and interruption times.
    Flow = 00 : 00 : 00
    Break = 00 : 00 : 00
    Interruption = 00 : 00 : 00
